page.title: 12CLUBS IN HOLTON-LE-CLAY
page.content: Here are some clubs related to {Holton-Community-Centre-Association which is attached to the school. The activities are {Under 12's football (Monday 6.00-7.30) {Keep Fit (Monday 7.30-9.00),Slimming {(Tuesday 7.00-8.30),Carpet Bowls {(Tuesday 7.00-8.30),Netball (Wednesday {7.00-8.30), Karate (Thursday {7.00-9.00), Sports' Club (Friday {7.00-10.00). Here are some clubs not related to Holton Community Centre Association. {Girl Guides (Monday 7.00-9.00),Girls {Brigade (Monday 7.00-8.00),Brownies {(Tuesday 5.30-7.00),Modelling Club {(Wednesday,Monthly 7.30-9.00),Ballet {Dancing (Wednesday 6.00-7.00),Cubs {(Friday 6.30-7.30) , Scouts (Friday {7.30-9.30) Some of these clubs are free but for some you have to pay.
